args:
Patia is enjoying a holiday at the beach when
suddenly Mikoto washes ashore and a gang
of imperial soldiers begin to attack! The two
warriors then step forward to defend the beach
and the vacations of all who rest upon it.
Look at these blue seas and white sandy\nbeaches... I believe this is going to be\nthe vacation of my dreams!
Vice Captain Patia\nOn leave (finally) from the White Sparrow Corps
You're certainly in high spirits, Patia.\nBut I understand—if anyone deserves\na vacation, it's you.
Indeed, I hear the White Sparrows have\nbeen forced to deal with everything from\nbears to pirates to mutants.
Aye, we've had a rough go of it lately.\nIt's nothing less than a miracle that I was\nable to join you on this vacation at all.
But now is the time to put my cares behind\nme and just enjoy my vaca—
Just my luck to begin my vacation being\nstruck by an errant chunk of driftwood.
Ho, this is no driftwood—it's a man!\nDo you yet draw breath, sir? Speak!
Heeding the will of Heaven, I have been\nlocked in a battle of life and death.\nYet how did I...?

One and the same: I am he who has
attained revelation and he who seeks
Mineuchi—and now I am he who
was swept away by the waves.
Er, and what does that mean, exactly?\nThe last part specifically.

I was surfing the ocean in search of
my poor lost cat Mineuchi when both
I and my board were swamped by a
rogue wave and shipwrecked.
How can one be ＂shipwrecked＂ on a\nsurfboard? Did it crack in two or—
And who did I encounter then, but a\nbeing possessed of unfathomable power!
By all means, do not let my sensible\nquestion interrupt your monologue.

As nature roiled all around me, it became
clear I had given offense and would be
forced to fight for my life. Thus did I battle
the fell being day and night without pause.
On the night of the third day, the beast\nunleashed a great flash upon my board.\nThat is when I knew the battle was—
You've been fighting on the ocean\nfor THREE DAYS?!
The next thing I knew, I found myself \nswept here. Ah, but where IS here?
This is Lathom Beach. You are Mikoto.\nOh, and I'm Patia, if you care.
Well, now that we know how you came\nto wash up on this beach, it seems clear\nyou aren't here to enjoy our vacation.
Still, if you intend to continue searching\nfor your cat, I suppose we could take the\ntime to escort you to the nearest harbor.
Hell no, he ain't comin' all the way here\njust to turn around and leave! Stick around,\nyeah? Kick back! Take a load off!
We would be thrilled to have you\njoin us, Mikoto. What do you say?
As divine providence guides us in all\nthings, I have clearly been reunited\nwith you here for a reason.
However, I am not acquainted with the\nspecific rituals of this...＂vacation,＂ was it?\nMight I seek your guidance in the matter?
Looks like we have a fresh recruit!\nIn that case, why don't we start out\nwith some basic beach activities?
I shall face all of your trials\nwith the zeal of a challenger!
In that case, everyone follow me!

Right! This game is called beach flags.
You see those flags over there, yes?
The idea is to run through the sand
in a pack and grab one of them!
I imagine whoever can claim a flag\nmost quickly is the victor?

You got it! But I gotta warn you, Patia and
I have captured more than a few flags in
our day. So at the risk of being a big jerk,
one of us is totally gonna win this thing.
Yes, yes, we're all sufficiently impressed.\nNow then, anyone who wants to participate\nshould line up here. Ready, set, g—
What? Rubbish! No one is that fast!
It is a trivial matter for one who has\nattained divine revelation.

Bwaaa ha ha! I knew ya shouldn't have
dismissed this guy as a noob! Ya better
give yer all in the next game—and I think
ya know exactly which game I mean.
I believe I do indeed.\nSo for our next event...
Behold! Beach volleyball! Let us see if\nyour fleet feet will avail you here, sir!
So we are to stand in the sand\nand bat this sphere about?
I think you will find it more complicated\nthan securing a flag. Are you ready?
Heavens above, I cannot possibly\nmatch the movements of this sphere!

That was my famed mirageball, feared the
world over by rookies and veterans alike!
Perhaps our dear Mikoto won't be walking
away with the prize so easily after all.
I wasn't aware this was a competition.
Well, now that I have seen what you are\ncapable of, perhaps you will permit me\nto set the next challenge.
Bring it on, pal—we're up for whatever!
When Luca said we were ＂ready for\nanything＂ I do not think he meant we\nwould be surfing with cats! ...Blurgh!
Cleo's gone under! Get a lifeguard, stat!
It does my balance no favors to\nshare my board with this cat.

If you but align yourself wholeheartedly
with the flow of nature, you will become
one with the waves—and the more you
trust your partner, the easier this will be.
Uh, okay? Hey there, kitty.\nGo easy on me here, ok—BLURGH!
You have ridden the rough waves well!\nThe joy within your cat speaks to the fact\nthat you are of singular talent.
That's all well and good, but how are\nwe even supposed to tell who is the\nvictor of such a ridiculous event?!
...I feel like I've done a lifetime of beach\nactivities today. I never knew some of\nthose even existed.

Mikoto's athleticism made for some truly
stirring competition. What say you,
Mikoto? How did you like your first
ever vacation?

It was quite the novel experience. Even
having attained revelation, I would never
have thought up the likes of best-of-three,
cat-surfing, and watermelon-smashing.
I think that was new to all of us...

Well, for a first-timer, ya put on one
helluva show. Maybe there really is
somethin' to that whole zen dealie
ya got goin' on.
Ah, so THAT is the secret to\nMikoto's otherworldly strength!
In that case, the next time we have a\nspare moment, I would hear all of your\nsecrets in terms of—
Get outta here, you lot!\nThis beach belongs to us now!

It's a lovely day for a hooooliday,
but not for any of yooooouuuu!
We're not gonna let you enjooooy it,
because you smell like...uh...traaaash!
Ugh! I can't take another minute\nof that off-key caterwauling!
I don't know what those scum are doing\nhere, but I won't let them ruin my vacation!
Hey, we're risking our lives out there while\nyou lot frolic and cavort at the beach!\nWell, now it's OUR turn for some fun!

Yep! It's a soldier summer vacation!
Oh, and we're gonna need the whole
beach, so let's all move along now.
That's it, off you pop. Taaaa!

As a knight of the White Sparrow Corps,
I shall not stand idly by while you ruin the
vacations of all merely so you can attempt
to have one of your own!
Heaven has spoken. Your behavior is\na violation of the natural order, and all\nthings must heed to nature's flow.
Cram it with walnuts, pal! If you won't get\noutta our way, we'll make you pay!
What the...? They deflected our attacks!
Your attacks were pathetic. Your Highness,\nwe shall stand our ground here—please\nsee the other vacationers to safety!

You curs are dealing with me now,
and I shall stop at nothing to protect 
the public order as well as the right
of the people to vacation in peace!

What Heaven knows, the earth knows—
and what the earth knows, Mikoto knows.
We will set down any and all in our path
so long as Heaven wills it.
